languages.text: "А теперь позвольте откланяться — я начну подготовку к путешествию. Из того, что мне удалось узнать, нам сначала необходимо посетить систему..." {n}Рубиновые глаза расширяются от удивления.{/n} "...Провидение Орселлио. Надо же. Быть может, страницы истории лгут? И вовсе не Калейн Орселлио подарил ее звездам название? В любом случае, именно из этой системы Тисифона начала свой путь, и мы отправимся по ее давно забытым следам".

traits.locale_text: "А теперь позвольте откланяться — я начну подготовку к путешествию. Из того, что мне удалось узнать, нам сначала необходимо посетить систему..." {n}Рубиновые глаза расширяются от удивления.{/n} "...Провидение Орселлио. Надо же. Быть может, страницы истории лгут? И вовсе не Калейн Орселлио подарил ее звездам название? В любом случае, именно из этой системы Тисифона начала свой путь, и мы отправимся по ее давно забытым следам".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "And now permit me to take my leave. I must start preparing for the journey. From what I have been able to glean, we must first travel to the—" {n}Her ruby-red eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "—the Orsellio Prophecy System. Odd that. Could it be that the historical records are lying? And Kaleyn Orsellio is not whom the star system is named after? Either way, that was the system from which Tisiphone embarked on her journey, and we are going to follow in her long-forgotten footsteps."
languages.original_text: "А теперь позвольте откланяться — я начну подготовку к путешествию. Из того, что мне удалось узнать, нам сначала необходимо посетить систему..." {n}Рубиновые глаза расширяются от удивления.{/n} "...Провидение Орселлио. Надо же. Быть может, страницы истории лгут? И вовсе не Калейн Орселлио подарил ее звездам название? В любом случае, именно из этой системы Тисифона начала свой путь, и мы отправимся по ее давно забытым следам".

traits.locale_text: "And now permit me to take my leave. I must start preparing for the journey. From what I have been able to glean, we must first travel to the—" {n}Her ruby-red eyes widen with astonishment.{/n} "—the Orsellio Prophecy System. How odd. Could it be that historical records are lying? And Kaleyn Orsellio is not whom the star system is named after? Either way, that was the system from which Tisiphone embarked on her journey, and we are going to follow in her long-forgotten tracks."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

Either way, that was the system from which Tisiphone embarked on her journey, and we are going to follow in her long-forgotten footsteps."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「では、失礼します。旅の支度をしなくては。あたくしが集めてきた情報によれば、最初の目的地は…」{n}カシアのルビー色の瞳が驚きで見開かれる。{/n}「…オーセリオの予言星系。妙ですね。歴史上の記録は嘘でしょうか？カレイン・オーセリオの名はその星系に由来しないのでしょうか？何にせよ、そこはティシフォンが目指した星系です、長らく忘れられていた彼女の足跡をたどることになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "And now permit me to take my leave. I must start preparing for the journey. From what I have been able to glean, we must first travel to the—" {n}Her ruby-red eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "—the Orsellio Prophecy System. Odd that. Could it be that the historical records are lying? And Kaleyn Orsellio is not whom the star system is named after? Either way, that was the system from which Tisiphone embarked on her journey, and we are going to follow in her long-forgotten footsteps."

traits.locale_text: 「では、失礼します。旅の支度をしなくては。あたくしが集めてきた情報によれば、最初の目的地は…」{n}カシアのルビー色の瞳が驚きで見開かれる。{/n}「…オーセリオの予言星系。妙ですね。歴史上の記録は嘘でしょうか？カレイン・オーセリオの名はその星系に由来しないのでしょうか？何にせよ、そこはティシフォンが目指した星系です、長らく忘れられていた彼女の足跡をたどることになるでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “现在，请允许我暂时告辞，我们必须为这场旅程做好准备。据我所知，我们必须先前往——”{n}她惊讶地瞪大了她红宝石般的眼睛。{/n}“——奥赛罗预言星系？这实在是太古怪了。难道历史记录记载的是谎言吗？莫非这个星系的名字并不是以卡莱恩·奥赛罗命名的吗？但无论怎样，提西福涅就是从那个星系出发，踏上了旅程，而我们也要循着她被遗忘已久的足迹前进。”
languages.original_text: "And now permit me to take my leave. I must start preparing for the journey. From what I have been able to glean, we must first travel to the—" {n}Her ruby-red eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "—the Orsellio Prophecy System. Odd that. Could it be that the historical records are lying? And Kaleyn Orsellio is not whom the star system is named after? Either way, that was the system from which Tisiphone embarked on her journey, and we are going to follow in her long-forgotten footsteps."

traits.locale_text: “现在，请允许我暂时告辞，我们必须为这场旅程做好准备。据我所知，我们必须先前往——”{n}她惊讶地瞪大了她红宝石般的眼睛。{/n}“——奥塞罗预言星系？这实在是太古怪了。难道历史记录记载的是谎言吗？莫非这个星系的名字并不是以卡莱恩·奥塞罗命名的吗？但无论怎样，提西福涅就是从那个星系出发，踏上了旅程，而我们也要循着她被遗忘已久的足迹前进。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Et maintenant, permettez-moi de prendre congé. Je dois me préparer pour le voyage. D'après ce que j'ai pu comprendre, nous devons d'abord nous rendre dans... {n}Elle écarquille ses yeux rubis de surprise.{/n} ... le système Prophétie d'Orsellio. Étrange. Serait-il possible que les archives mentent et que le système n'ait pas été nommé en hommage à Kaleyn Orsellio ? Quoi qu'il en soit, c'est dans ce système que Tisiphone a embarqué pour son voyage, c'est donc de là que nous partirons pour retrouver sa trace. »
languages.original_text: "And now permit me to take my leave. I must start preparing for the journey. From what I have been able to glean, we must first travel to the—" {n}Her ruby-red eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "—the Orsellio Prophecy System. Odd that. Could it be that the historical records are lying? And Kaleyn Orsellio is not whom the star system is named after? Either way, that was the system from which Tisiphone embarked on her journey, and we are going to follow in her long-forgotten footsteps."

traits.locale_text: « Et maintenant, permettez-moi de prendre congé. Je dois me préparer pour le voyage. D'après ce que j'ai pu comprendre, nous devons d'abord nous rendre dans... {n}Elle écarquille ses yeux rubis de surprise.{/n} ... le système Prophétie d'Orsellio. Étrange. Serait-il possible que les archives mentent et que le système n'ait pas été nommé en hommage à Kaleyn Orsellio ? Quoi qu'il en soit, c'est dans ce système que Tisiphone a embarqué pour son voyage, c'est donc de là que nous partirons pour retrouver sa trace. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Y ahora me iré, con su permiso. Debo empezar los preparativos de la travesía. Según mis cálculos, primero hemos de dirigirnos a...». {n}Sus ojos de color rubí se abren como platos por el asombro.{/n} «... el sistema Profecía de Orsellio. Qué raro. ¿Estarán equivocados los archivos históricos? ¿No se llama así el sistema por Kaleyn Orsellio? En fin, ese fue el sistema desde el que Tisiphone emprendió su viaje, y ahí comienza el antiquísimo rastro que nosotros hemos de seguir».
languages.original_text: "And now permit me to take my leave. I must start preparing for the journey. From what I have been able to glean, we must first travel to the—" {n}Her ruby-red eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "—the Orsellio Prophecy System. Odd that. Could it be that the historical records are lying? And Kaleyn Orsellio is not whom the star system is named after? Either way, that was the system from which Tisiphone embarked on her journey, and we are going to follow in her long-forgotten footsteps."

traits.locale_text: «Y ahora me iré, con su permiso. Debo empezar los preparativos de la travesía. Según mis cálculos, primero hemos de dirigirnos a...». {n}Sus ojos de color rubí se abren como platos por el asombro.{/n} «... el sistema Profecía de Orsellio. Qué raro. ¿Estarán equivocados los archivos históricos? ¿No se llama así el sistema por Kaleyn Orsellio? En fin, ese fue el sistema desde el que Tisiphone emprendió su viaje, y ahí comienza el antiquísimo rastro que nosotros hemos de seguir».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Und nun gestattet mir, mich zu verabschieden. Ich muss die Reise vorbereiten. Nach allem, was ich in Erfahrung bringen konnte, müssen wir zunächst in das",{n} ihre rubinroten Augen weiten sich vor Erstaunen,{/n} "System Orsellio-Prophezeiung reisen. Merkwürdig. Vielleicht lügen die historischen Quellen? Und das Sternensystem wurde gar nicht nach Kaleyn Orsellio benannt? Wie dem auch sei, in diesem System hat Tisiphone ihre Reise begonnen, und wir werden in ihre längst vergessenen Fußstapfen treten."
languages.original_text: "And now permit me to take my leave. I must start preparing for the journey. From what I have been able to glean, we must first travel to the—" {n}Her ruby-red eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "—the Orsellio Prophecy System. Odd that. Could it be that the historical records are lying? And Kaleyn Orsellio is not whom the star system is named after? Either way, that was the system from which Tisiphone embarked on her journey, and we are going to follow in her long-forgotten footsteps."

traits.locale_text: "Und nun gestattet mir, mich zu verabschieden. Ich muss die Reise vorbereiten. Nach allem, was ich in Erfahrung bringen konnte, müssen wir zunächst in das",{n} ihre rubinroten Augen weiten sich vor Erstaunen,{/n} "System Orsellio-Prophezeiung reisen. Merkwürdig. Vielleicht lügen die historischen Quellen? Und das Sternensystem wurde gar nicht nach Kaleyn Orsellio benannt? Wie dem auch sei, in diesem System hat Tisiphone ihre Reise begonnen, und wir werden ihrer längst vergessenen Spur folgen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Müsaadenle ben artık gideyim. Seyahate hazırlanmaya başlamam lazım. Çıkarabildiğim kadarıyla ilk istikametimiz..." {n}Yakut kırmızısı gözleri, hayret içinde açılıyor.{/n} "Orsellio Kehaneti Sistemi. Çok acayip. Acaba tarihî kayıtlara yanlış girilmiş olabilir mi? Bu yıldız sisteminin adı, Kaleyn Orsellio'dan gelmiyor mu? Her hâlükârda bu, Tisiphone'nin seyahatine başladığı sistem. Gittiği yol çoktan unutulmuş olsa da peşinden gideceğiz."
languages.original_text: "And now permit me to take my leave. I must start preparing for the journey. From what I have been able to glean, we must first travel to the—" {n}Her ruby-red eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "—the Orsellio Prophecy System. Odd that. Could it be that the historical records are lying? And Kaleyn Orsellio is not whom the star system is named after? Either way, that was the system from which Tisiphone embarked on her journey, and we are going to follow in her long-forgotten footsteps."

traits.locale_text: "Artık müsaadenle ben gideyim. Seyahate hazırlanmaya başlamam lazım. Çıkarabildiğim kadarıyla ilk istikametimiz..." {n}Yakut kırmızısı gözleri, hayret içinde açılıyor.{/n} "...Orsellio Kehanet Sistemi. Çok acayip. Acaba tarihî kayıtlar yalan söylüyor olabilir mi? Bu yıldız sisteminin adı, Kaleyn Orsellio'dan gelmiyor mu? Her hâlükârda Tisiphone'nin seyahatine başladığı sistem bu. Gittiği yol çoktan unutulmuş olsa da peşinden gideceğiz."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
